title: 7.75 SGPA
content:
How many marks do we need in each subject to get 7.75 SGPA . Just wanted to know rough idea.

I am in physics cycle now  

Thanks

comments.body:
To get an SGPA of 8, you need at least a 70 in all courses. So a little lower than that in every course will fetch you a 7.75. 

FYI an easy way to figure out how much you need to score is to know the average minimum marks needed for a particular GPA. Obviously, if you perform extremely well in one course, it will allow you to get slightly lower on another course. 

|SGPA|Required Grade in all Courses|Required Marks for Grade|
|:-|:-|:-|
|10|S|90+|
|9|A|80-89|
|8|B|70-79|

and so on...

assuming 40/50 in internals u need 70/100 in esa

if internals is lower  then more in esa 

else internals higher less in esa

1 A  3 B's  1 C  is enough
My 3 isa are over and my final isa marks are around 15 only as of now in all the subjects so I need to score much in esa but ESA's are difficult to score
min 65 assuming u are able to get 20/20 in internals and final isa is 20/30

this sem pattern changed
40/50 for isa
10 marks are only in the teacher's hands this time......which makes it very difficult to score
